summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Theme and Text Container functionality. All requested features are working correctly including Forest Executive theme changes, text container toggle, Modern Luxury theme application, and gradient effects on Hero slides.
passed_tests: Backend API health check (100% success rate - 5/5 tests passed)
Dashboard loads successfully with 16 project cards
Editor opens and loads correctly with Mock Presentation project
Hero slide type selection works correctly
Forest Executive theme application works - Hero text container background changes to Mint Cream (#F2F7F5)
Forest Executive theme - Hero text color changes to Emerald (#064E3B) as expected
Text Container toggle OFF works - Hero text container background becomes transparent
Text remains readable when text container is OFF due to shadow/overlay effects
Text Container toggle ON works - background is restored properly
Modern Luxury theme application works correctly
Body slide text container updates properly with Modern Luxury theme
Gradient text effect works - applied successfully to Hero title using theme colors
Universal theme update works - changing theme updates all slides
Navigation between slide types (Hero/Body) works correctly
Real-time slide canvas updates when design changes are made
Screenshot capture functionality works for all tested scenarios
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (5/5 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (18/18 features tested successfully)
